mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Estate of Hamilton Helms
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Estate of Hamilton Helms Emma Jones, daughter A. F. Helms, son M. K. Helms, son M. C. Helms, son Soloman E. Helms, son Susan E. Mabry, daughter D. Slusher, Sheriff of Floyd County and as such Administrator de bonis non Recorded in Ledger Book 4, Page 327, in the Floyd County Courthouse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
